Room.Name: Evander's Repair Shop
Room.ShortDescription: You are in Evander's Repair Shop where all kinds of weapons and armors can be repaired for a small sum of gold.
Room.LongDescription: The Repair Shop is one of the best around. The skilled workers provide the best service, especially on metallic armors and weapons. A large worker covered in soot comes up to the front desk and asks you if he can help you with something.
